text: Hi everyone, we’ve developed a UI extension app to display an external web app inside the HubSpot deal record page. We’re now looking to merge it with our existing Marketplace app. Does anyone know if it’s possible to list a UI extension app in the Marketplace, given that UI extensions are currently in beta? Let me know if you need any clarification!
Yes you can list your UIX app. It’s only your Dev portal that is enrolled in the beta. Customers can install your app without having to enrol in any beta.
<@U037QED9TR6> Thanks for confirming! That’s great to know. I’ll proceed with the listing then. Appreciate your help!
